DOC.brief_summary: This study wants to investigate the hemodynamic changes in cardiopatic patients undergoing major non cardiac surgery, during and after the continuous infusion of levosimendan or dobutamine.
DOC.brief_title: Levosimendan Versus Dobutamine in Cardiopatic Patients Undergoing Major Non Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: EF < 40%, no liver and renal disfynction, chronic cardiopathy acute coronary syndrome, life expectation <30 days, hemodialysis, ventricular tachycardia/ventricular fibrillation
